column2: "If you stew Vol Dragon fangs long enough, they'll release just the right amount of acidity to tenderize meat so that it melts in your mouth."
"If I succeed at this, of course, I plan to enter the contest!"
"I'd love to make the big leap from galley cook to gourmet chef."
"This is what I've always dreamed of. Please, you have to do this for me! Please? Just make sure you don't damage the goods, okay?"
